snippet.title: 'Fargo' recap: Everything happens for a reason
snippet.description: Molly begins to suspect Lester is involved with the murders, while the Fargo muscle arrives in Bemidji to start an investigation of their own. Malvo takes on a new client: the Supermarket King of Minnesota.

snippet.title: 'American Horror Story' season finale recap: Me, Myself, and My Mother's Daughter
snippet.description: The Coven welcomes a new Supreme. Not everyone gets out alive.

snippet.title: 'Arrested Development': Season 4 binge recap!
snippet.description: I've made a huge, tiny mistake: I agreed to recap ALL of Netflix's 15 new Arrested Development episodes, right away, in ONE blog post! What...

snippet.title: 'Justified' recap: Goin' Home
snippet.description: As Raylan hunts Randall and Lindsey, Ava and Boyd make a decision about Ellen May

snippet.title: 'Sons of Anarchy' recap: Jax got this?

snippet.title: 'Sons of Anarchy' recap: The Lost Boy
snippet.description: First things first, that song you want to download, the one played over Opie's wake, is Greg Holden's "The Lost Boy." I got chills when...

snippet.title: 'Modern Family' recap: Satan's Trifecta
snippet.description: Cam's a Leap Day baby and Phil just wants to trapeze on this once-every-four-years extravaganza

snippet.title: 'New Girl' recap: Not a Dessert Person
snippet.description: Nick's aloof new lady friend brought out the crybaby in everyone except Winston, who was trying to get his swagger back

snippet.title: 'Once Upon a Time' recap: Becoming David Nolan
snippet.description: John Doe finally makes his choice. Also -- dragons!
